nodes.text: During the Defense of Maridun, this OOM command battle droid, under command of Lok Durd led the Separatist attack on the Lurmen village. He was destroyed by Anakin Skywalker.

When Separatist forces were sent to Maridun to test a new weapon, this droid was part of the task force. He informed General Lok Durd of the defenses of the Lurmen village. In the ensuing fight the droid was destroyed in his AAT by Anakin Skywalker.
